description: 062M/01An aspen forest, with song birds, amphibians, mammals, and reptiles make this an interesting walk.  There is a boardwalk going through the watery area to keep yer toes dry. Official City Description (pops)
directions: Go West on Broadway St.  Just past the AgriPlex, turn right (N) and look for parking lot on the right within 100m.
title: Yorkton Ravine Ecological Preserve
